item.title: New note
item.author: hello@roytang.net (Roy Tang)
item.description: Local banks need to be making sure their websites work with Firefox. Not everyone uses Chrome!

item.title: New note
item.author: hello@roytang.net (Roy Tang)
item.description:
Despite not having played Eternal since before the pandemic, after reading this tweet from LSV, I signed up for the event he described and got the 7 wins and qualified for the LCQ in the first try. I used Skelle’s decklist from here: https://direwolfdigital.com/news/throne-summer-championship-decklists/

I’m having fun!

Quoted lsv's tweet:
This is the perfect time to get into Eternal - you can try any deck you want, you’ve got a high-stakes tournament to play in, and there are lots of resources in the article for decklists, strategy guides, and more. I’m really hype about this, and would love to see what you think!

@EternalCardGame should I have gotten some kind of token from these prize chests? How can I verify that I’m qualified for the LCQ?

item.title: New note
item.author: hello@roytang.net (Roy Tang)
item.description:
Unlikely, as long as their fanbase remains rabid. Here in the Philippines, Marcos’ children have risen the ranks in local politics unrepentant of and despite their father’s infamy, on the back of patronage and propaganda

Quoted JessicaValenti's tweet:

One day Ivanka will try to separate herself from her father in an attempt to reenter polite society. There will be a tearful confession, a book deal, or a glossy PR campaign.

We can never let that bullshit be successful

https://twitter.com/IvankaTrump/status/1319476405080645634

item.title: New note
item.author: hello@roytang.net (Roy Tang)
item.description:
10/23 Friday afternoon Zendikar Rising draft! ep9 https://www.twitch.tv/twitchyroy #mtg #magicarena #mtgznr #twitch

Draft no. 11 went reasonably well, although I realized later that I didn’t get a full art land for this one, apparently the promo had already ended. Will still play one more draft next week in this series to wrap it up, I guess.

YT: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=xyVM_lf2Vlo&feature=youtu.be

item.description:
Repost from Toadsanime https://twitter.com/Toadsanime/statuses/1312880060899233797/:

Low on funds for games?

Or want to experience something fun and unique?

The freeware indie scene has always been home to many of the most varied & creative ideas in gaming.

Here’s my GIANT, regularly updated thread of completely, 100% free games! Plz try some!❤️

item.title: New note
item.author: hello@roytang.net (Roy Tang)
item.description:
As an electronics engineer and someone who puts his own pcs together, this was great to watch, but damn that console is huge!

Quoted PlayStation's tweet:

The official PS5 teardown video is here: http://play.st/3lgZ884

Get up-close and personal with PS5’s next-generation technology, a culmination of five years of design and development.

item.author: hello@roytang.net (Roy Tang)
item.description:
Reply to zalthehuman's tweet at https://twitter.com/zalthehuman/statuses/1307271094131257344/:

@zalthehuman republic acts are laws passed by congress and signed by yhe president. administrative orders are issued by the executive branch as part of his duties and thus limited to the powers of the executive

item.title: Repost from aevanko https://twitter.com/aevanko/statuses/1306457167088594944/:
item.author: hello@roytang.net (Roy Tang)
item.description:
Repost from aevanko https://twitter.com/aevanko/statuses/1306457167088594944/:

Fun fact: Japan uses a predetermined fortune telling calendar thing called Rokuyou (六曜) Six days. Most calendars have the type of day written on them by default. The most lucky day is Taian (大安). Every major PlayStation console launched on a 大安 day in Japan, except one.

item.title: New note
item.author: hello@roytang.net (Roy Tang)
item.description:
I’ve been alive for 40+ years, I dont think I’ve believed anything in the past that would get me “cancelled” today. (not that I’m worth “cancelling”), so maybe “everyone” is a bit strong

Quoted paulg's tweet:
Since everyone in the past believed things that would get you cancelled today, the factor that determines whether they’ll actually be cancelled is whether or not they happened to publish such beliefs. Which is almost random, but not quite; those who wrote little are safer.

item.title: New note
item.author: hello@roytang.net (Roy Tang)
item.description:
Zendikar Rising draft! ep1 https://www.twitch.tv/twitchyroy #mtg #magicarena #twitch #mtgzkn

So I managed to play one game (and lost) before server-related issues. Will continue later, but here’s my draft deck

I managed to play 2 drafts during this episode: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=N2rcdcJSloo

Unfortunately (spoiler!) I performed very poorly D: Have to figure out what I’m doing wrong (aside from the obvious misplays), feel free to give feedback!

2nd draft deck (BG):

item.title: New photos
item.author: hello@roytang.net (Roy Tang)
item.description:
While checking to see if Zendikar was already on #magicarena, I found that I still had an unfinished Historic Event with Jeskai Fires. I get to play with banned cards!

oops, went down for maintenance! Hopefully this is still around when it comes back up (and that I dont get the third loss!)

We’re back! I decided to wrap this up before drafting Zendikar. When my opponents pause with Fires or Teferi on the stack, I can only assume they are dumbfounded lol

Got my 3rd loss to Rakdos Arcanist, which gives you an idea of how dumb that deck is. Maybe it’s safe to bring Teferi and Fires back now? Lol. Anyway, on to Zendikar!

item.title: New note
item.author: hello@roytang.net (Roy Tang)
item.description:
There’s something to be said about how straightforward “Playstation 5” is compared to the debacle that is Xbox naming

Quoted IGN's tweet:

The Xbox Series S will not run Xbox One X enhanced versions of backwards compatible games, but will instead run Xbox One S versions of Xbox One and Xbox 360 titles.

https://bit.ly/2Fv4ltE

item.title: New photos
item.author: hello@roytang.net (Roy Tang)
item.description: Hit mythic on #magicarena (relatively) early this month, running BO1 Jund Sacrifice in Historic. This means I can focus on Limited when Zendikar rolls in this week!
